main event: A bright light blue object was observed for about 2 seconds in Oatman, Arizona on November 22, 1966.
interesting points: The object was perfectly round and about 6-7 inches in diameter.
The object had reddish-orange streaks in the rear, ending in a point about 2 feet behind the object.
The object was traveling from an easterly direction to a westerly direction, about 20 degrees from vertical (downward).
The observer was sitting about 11 feet from the window and the object crossed the window diagonally (27 inches).
There was a faint rumbling sound reported on the radio during the observation.
